The printing on this hoodie is very cute. The pink is vibrant and the printing was clear. The zipper worked just fine. My complaint is the material itself. It feels very very inexpensive. This will be gifted to a child who is less picky about material quality. Who is less picky about material quality.
My daughter loves it. The only negative is the zipper. It's hard to zip up and down.
